full_text:
Page 2685
Re: Staffing
From Hugh Hurwitz
To L. Cristina Griffith
Date 2019/08/12 21:49
Subject: Re: Staffing
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Yes...Gonna be trained as correctional workers first all over...ray is checking but he's a materials handler and probably promoted up from CO...he's the on
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: "L. Cristina Griffith" [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 9:45 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Staffing
>>> "L. Cristina Griffith" 08/12/2019 21:45 >>>
So CNN is reporting that one of the officers on Epstein's unit was not a "full fledged" correctional officer....unbelievable.....
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: Hugh Hurwitz [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 9:07 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: "L. Cristina Griffith" [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Staffing
>>> "Hugh Hurwitz" 08/12/2019 21:07 >>>
I didn't read the press release. It's less about responding to CNN directly and more an opportunity to give DOJ some TPs to use to counter the narrative th have some TPs we can provide on that if we want. Either way, don't spend a ton of time on this, not sure they will use it.
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: "L. Cristina Griffith" [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 9:01 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Staffing
>>> "L. Cristina Griffith" 08/12/2019 21:01 >>>
Am i responding to the comments in the afgie press release? I did not see his CNN interview. lemme know
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: Hugh Hurwitz [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 8:45 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: "L. Cristina Griffith" [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>, Ray Ormond [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Staffing
>>> "Hugh Hurwitz" 08/12/2019 20:45 >>>
Cristina, DOJ is pushing back on some statements CNN [b(6) said re staff shortages. In the morning, can you come up with just a couple talking points tha
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
Page 17741
DOJ-OGR-00026341

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing staffing issues related to Jeffrey Epstein's unit. The emails are heavily redacted, with names and email addresses obscured. The conversation involves discussing CNN reports and preparing talking points for DOJ.
